summary: David Cassidy  is an American singer, actor, songwriter and guitarist.
full_text: David Bruce Cassidy  is an American actor, singer, songwriter and guitarist. He is widely known for his role as Keith Partridge in the 1970s musical-sitcom The Partridge Family, which led to him becoming one of pop culture's most celebrated teen idols and pop singers of the 1970s. He has since had a career in both acting and music.
title: David Cassidy
